text: On 8 October 2021, a suicide bombing happened at the Shia Gozar-e-Sayed Abad Mosque in the Afghan city of Kunduz. Over 100 people were killed and another 100 injured. The official death toll provided to Agence France Presse was 46, and 143 injured. The attack is the deadliest in Afghanistan since U.S. troops left in August. The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the attack. On 15 October 2021, an IS-KP suicide bomber killed 65 people at a Shia mosque in Kandahar. ==Related pages== *Cabinet of prime minister Akhund ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Afghanistan Category:2020s building bombings Category:2020s explosions in Asia Category:2020s murders in Asia Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2021 Category:Attacks on mosques Category:Attacks on religious buildings and structures in Asia Category:Massacres in Afghanistan Category:Explosions in 2021 Category:Explosions in Afghanistan Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Asia Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2020s 2021 mosque bombing Category:Mass murder in 2021 Category:2021 massacres in Asia Category:October 2021 events Category:Suicide bombings in Asia Category:Suicide bombings in the 2020s Category:Suicide in 2021 Category:Terrorist incidents in Asia in 2021 Category:War in Afghanistan (since 1978)
title: 2021 Kunduz mosque bombing
